alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 09 at 11:16AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern New Haven and northern Middlesex Counties through NOON EDT... At 1115 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over North Branford, or near Wallingford, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Meriden, Middletown, Wallingford, Guilford, East Hampton, Durham, Hamden, Branford, North Haven, North Branford, Cromwell, Portland, Haddam, Killingworth and Middlefield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Southern New Haven
